description:
The “Core” libraries from the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/).

This does not include the `p5.accessibility` library because, as [noted on its home page](https://github.com/processing/p5.accessibility), it is obsolete.

“Community” libraries from the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/).

This list does not include a couple of libraries that could not be automatically included.
Libraries that are not specific to p5.js, but are useful for p5 sketches.
Libraries that are not on the official [p5.js Libraries page](https://p5js.org/libraries/), but appear to be useful and well-maintained.
